body: I'm not sorry but if you read this comment, you'll have a girlfriend in the next few months. To activate this blessing, paste this in other comment sections 3 times... don't really believe in this stuff, personally, but I figured "hey, why not? couldn't hurt, at the very least."
Controversial as this maybe but I felt like tifa and could made a better couple than aerith and cloud and this doujin proves it
Beautiful vanilla wholesome 10/10 thank you for making this ❤️
This was vanilla as fuck, so wholesome and definitely something i needed, couldn't fap to it tho
They should add the vanilla tag
Loved it. Missing defloration tag, though.
been waiting for this to be translated. artist is dope. hope they can translate the rest of their works.
